{"28":{"id":"28","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"SHERATON RESORT","tenbaiviet_en":"SHERATON RESORT","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<div style=\"margin: 0px 0px 17px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand Danang Resort t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc c&aacute;t tr\u1eafng xinh \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/khu-nghi-duong-sheraton-grand-da-nang-chao-don-quy-khach-den-voi-nhung-ki-nghi-mua-le-hoi-tran-ngap-niem-vui-03.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n<\/div>","noidung_en":"<div style=\"margin: 0px 0px 17px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand Danang Resort t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc c&aacute;t tr\u1eafng xinh \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div Resort c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay Cam Ranh kho\u1ea3ng 39,2km, c&aacute;ch ga Nha Trang 2,4km v&agrave; c&aacute;ch trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Nha Trang kho\u1ea3ng 3,6km.<br \/>\r\nKhu ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chia th&agrave;nh 02 khu: Khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Cham Island (cao 4 t\u1ea7ng) v&agrave; Khu c\u0103n h\u1ed9 du l\u1ecbch (cao 6 t\u1ea7ng) &amp; Bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1 Cham Oasis. Khu ngh\u1ec9 c&oacute; 168 ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed1 tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Resort do C&ocirc;ng Ty B&Igrave;NH<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Gi\u1eefa m&agrave;u xanh b\u1ea1t ng&agrave;n c\u1ee7a n&uacute;i r\u1eebng trung du H&ograve;a B&igrave;nh \u0111ang h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u mang t&ecirc;n Ivory Villas &amp; Resort. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch tr&ecirc;n di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch 66ha, Ivory Villas &amp; Resort g\u1ed3m 4 ph&acirc;n khu ch&iacute;nh, m\u1ed7i ph&acirc;n khu l&agrave; 1 resort ho&agrave;n ch\u1ec9nh v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li&ecirc;n k\u1ebft trong m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n m\u1ed9t chu\u1ed7i nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7n nghi \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p.<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><iframe align=\"middle\" allowfullscreen=\"0\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"350\" scrolling=\"no\" src=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/XTBQ6IC-CGQ\" width=\"500\"><\/iframe><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<div data-css=\"tve-u-17236631cb7\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><span style=\"font-size:24px;\"><span style=\"font-size:24px;\"><span style=\"color:#2ecc71;\"><strong>KHU NGH\u1ec8 D\u01af\u1ee0NG SINH TH&Aacute;I KI\u1ec2U M\u1eaaU B\u1eacC NH\u1ea4T H&Ograve;A B&Igrave;NH<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Gi\u1eefa m&agrave;u xanh b\u1ea1t ng&agrave;n c\u1ee7a n&uacute;i r\u1eebng trung du H&ograve;a B&igrave;nh \u0111ang h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u mang t&ecirc;n Ivory Villas &amp; Resort. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch tr&ecirc;n di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch 66ha, Ivory Villas &amp; Resort g\u1ed3m 4 ph&acirc;n khu ch&iacute;nh, m\u1ed7i ph&acirc;n khu l&agrave; 1 resort ho&agrave;n ch\u1ec9nh v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li&ecirc;n k\u1ebft trong m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n m\u1ed9t chu\u1ed7i nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7n nghi \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p.<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><iframe align=\"middle\" allowfullscreen=\"0\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"350\" scrolling=\"no\" src=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/XTBQ6IC-CGQ\" width=\"500\"><\/iframe><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"385\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot%202021-06-08%20131127.jpg\" width=\"995\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"ivory-hoa-binh","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"3","icon":"1623068222_IVORY-HOA-BINH.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1623051343","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"371","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_title_en":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_keywords_en":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_description_en":"IVORY - HOA BINH","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"},"45":{"id":"45","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 L\u1eaeP \u0110\u1eb6T TR\u1eccN G\u00d3I KH\u00d3A \u0110I\u1ec6N T\u1eec D\u00c0NH CHO H\u1ec6 TH\u1ed0NG KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N, KHU NGH\u1ec8 D\u01af\u1ee0NG, CHUNG C\u01af, CAO \u1ed0C V\u0102N PH\u00d2NG, KHU LI\u00caN\/PH\u1ee8C H\u1ee2P","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"<p>L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t&nbsp;c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed [Wifi\/Bluetooth - V&acirc;n tay - M\u1eadt m&atilde;&nbsp;- Th\u1ebb t\u1eeb - Ch&igrave;a c\u01a1] t\u1ea1i nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1 \/ chung c\u01b0 \/ khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \/ kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \/ d\u1ef1 &aacute;n l\u1edbn nh\u1ecf.<\/p>","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<div><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"color:#2c3e50;\"><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span>\r\n<p><span arial=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed kh&ocirc;ng c&ograve;n xa l\u1ea1 \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng t\u1ea1i th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Hi\u1ec7n nay, kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111ang l&agrave; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 thay th\u1ebf c&aacute;c d&ograve;ng kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng. L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u g&igrave;? Quy tr&igrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed di\u1ec5n ra nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n&agrave;o? H&atilde;y c&ugrave;ng OBT VN tham kh\u1ea3o ngay b&agrave;i vi\u1ebft d\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111&acirc;y:<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng t&iacute;nh n\u0103ng th&ocirc;ng minh, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd \u0111em \u0111\u1ebfn kh&ocirc;ng gian s\u1ed1ng tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i, ti\u1ec7n nghi v\u1edbi m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 an ninh v&agrave; b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt h\u01a1n bao gi\u1edd h\u1ebft.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"320\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/residential-locksmith-services.jpg\" width=\"480\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"> <strong>L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u g&igrave;?<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed&nbsp;c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn. B\u1edfi ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n sai s&oacute;t m\u1ed9t ch&uacute;t l&agrave; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l&agrave;m kh&oacute;a b\u1ecb l\u1ec7ch, kh&ocirc;ng l\u1eafp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh&oacute;a ho\u1eb7c t\u1ec7 h\u01a1n l&agrave; h\u1ecfng lu&ocirc;n c\u1ea3 c&aacute;nh c\u1eeda. Do \u0111&oacute;, khi l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o hai y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u quan tr\u1ecdng sau:<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ol>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">X&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ed9 d&agrave;y c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda: d&ugrave; l&agrave; c\u1eeda s\u1eaft, c\u1eeda k&iacute;nh, c\u1eeda g\u1ed7 hay c\u1eeda nh\u1ef1a gi\u1ea3 g\u1ed7, \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda ph\u1ea3i c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 d&agrave;y t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u t\u1eeb 35-40mm m\u1edbi c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l\u1eafp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh&oacute;a.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">X&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ed9 r\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda: \u0111\u1ed9 r\u1ed9ng ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea1t t\u1eeb 95-100mm. L\u01b0u &yacute;, c\u1ea7n tr\u1eeb \u0111i ph\u1ea7n ch\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 c&oacute; k&iacute;ch th\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111o ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c nh\u1ea5t.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p c\u1eeda c\u1ee7a qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch kh&ocirc;ng \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nh\u1eefng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u tr&ecirc;n th&igrave; qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch kh&ocirc;ng n&ecirc;n c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t. Thay v&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;, h&atilde;y tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp li&ecirc;n h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda chuy&ecirc;n nghi\u1ec7p nh\u01b0 OBT.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">OBT mang t\u1edbi d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda chuy&ecirc;n nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o t&iacute;nh th\u1ea9m m\u1ef9 v&agrave; b\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb9p cho c&aacute;nh c\u1eeda.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Quy tr&igrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed t\u1ea1i OBT<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 1: \u0110&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u v&agrave; x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ti&ecirc;n, \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt vi&ecirc;n t\u1eeb OBT s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v&agrave; \u0111&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t b\u1ed9 ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a l&ecirc;n c\u1eeda. Ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a l&agrave; &ldquo;tr&aacute;i tim&rdquo; c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 b\u1ed9 kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda, do \u0111&oacute; ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh c\u1ee7a kh&oacute;a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c di\u1ec5n ra tr\u01a1n tru nh\u1ea5t.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 2: Ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh khoan \u0111\u1ee5c v&agrave; ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda cho c\u1eeda<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">\u1ede b\u01b0\u1edbc n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda theo \u0111&uacute;ng c&aacute;c v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u. Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i s\u1ebd cho ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a v&agrave;o khu&ocirc;n \u0111&uacute;c, k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t v\u1eeba kh&iacute;t v&agrave;o b&ecirc;n trong c\u1eeda, qua \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ed9 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb k&ecirc;nh cho ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a. <span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 3: Ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t, h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch c&aacute;ch thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp v&agrave; s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Sau khi ho&agrave;n t\u1ea5t l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t, k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a OBT s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh l\u1eafp pin v&agrave; ki\u1ec3m tra c&aacute;c ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a kh&oacute;a. Khi th\u1ea5y qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh \u0111&oacute;ng\/m\u1edf c\u1ee7a c\u1eeda di\u1ec5n ra \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh, qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c&aacute;ch thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp c&aacute;c ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 nh\u1ea5t. T\u1ed5ng th\u1eddi gian t&iacute;nh t\u1eeb l&uacute;c x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp v&agrave; ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t l&agrave; t\u1eeb 1.5-2 ti\u1ebfng.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"255\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Installing-front-door-lock.jpg\" width=\"509\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><v:rect alt=\"data:image\/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAPABAP\/\/\/wAAACH5BAEKAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==\" filled=\"f\" id=\"Rectangle_x0020_9\" steel color lasts more than 10 years<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p open=\"\" sans=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 1em; border: 0px; outline: 0px; background-image: initial; 0px; outline: 0px; background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial;
